hero.label: Professional Profile
hero.role: IT Specialist | Web Systems, Automation & Infrastructure
hero.currentWork: Currently working on a multi-tenant reservation management system:

experience.label: Trajectory
experience.title: My experience is focused on solving real problems
experience.subtitle: At each stage I took on context, executed solutions, and left more stable systems for the team.

items.title: Institutional Technology Coordination
items.summary: I coordinate digital transformation initiatives at the provincial level, focusing on infrastructure, architecture, and operational continuity.
items.highlight: I implemented automated workflows to improve efficiency and reduce errors.

items.title: Independent Development and Consulting
items.summary: I design and build web products for organizations with integration, performance, and scalability needs.
items.highlight: I deliver end-to-end solutions, from architecture to production deployment.

architecture.label: Architecture & Operations
architecture.title: I design infrastructure to sustain real production load
architecture.subtitle: These are practices I apply to deploy, operate, and scale systems without adding friction to the team.

cases.title: CI/CD with Zero Friction
cases.summary: I design pipelines with GitHub Actions, pre-validations, and automated deployment on Linux VPS.
cases.impact: More predictable releases and lower operational risk.

cases.title: Maintainable Infrastructure
cases.summary: I work with Docker, Nginx as a reverse proxy, automated SSL, and monitoring of critical services.
cases.impact: Predictable environments and faster recovery from incidents.

apis.label: APIs & Integrations
apis.title: I design and implement integrations without losing technical control or operability.
apis.subtitle: I work with APIs and events focusing on clear contracts, traceable errors, and continuous operation.

cases.title: Webhooks for Continuous Flow
cases.summary: I use webhooks to trigger validations, deployments, and operational notifications automatically.
cases.impact: Less time between merge and production availability, with end-to-end traceability.

cases.title: Bots for Daily Monitoring
cases.summary: I develop Telegram bots to query service health, processes, and deployment events.
cases.impact: Faster deviation detection, without relying on isolated dashboards.

data.label: Data & Performance
data.title: I optimize data and performance with a focus on real production.
data.subtitle: I measure, adjust, and re-measure to reduce latency and sustain stability in production.

cases.title: Data with Real Isolation
cases.summary: I apply Row Level Security in PostgreSQL with policies aligned to each organization's context.
cases.impact: Lower risk of data leakage and greater operational confidence in multi-tenant environments.

cases.title: Performance Guided by Measurement
cases.summary: I analyze execution plans, adjust indexes, and apply caching based on consumption patterns.
cases.impact: Sustained reduction in latency for queries and high-traffic endpoints.

software.label: Software Architecture
software.title: I structure code to iterate quickly without losing clarity.
software.subtitle: I define structures that allow testing, deploying, and evolving the system with less risk.

cases.title: Layered Architecture
cases.summary: I organize actions, services, and repositories with clear contracts and controlled dependencies.
cases.impact: Readable and maintainable code, prepared to scale functionally and technically.

cases.title: Domain Modeling
cases.summary: I apply Domain-Driven Design principles to entities, value objects, and context boundaries.
cases.impact: Less conceptual debt and a more faithful representation of business rules.

education.label: Education
education.title: I maintain academic foundation and continuous learning
education.subtitle: I combine formal education with practical learning to make better technical decisions in real projects.

formal.title: University Programmer Analyst / Systems Degree
formal.summary: I trained in system design, data modeling, software architecture, and development methodologies.

formal.title: Digital Talents - Full Stack

formal.summary: I completed intensive training in modern web development, collaborative work, and agile delivery cycles.
